attributes.action: acknowledge the total and irreversible loss of trust in parliament, and announce the date of the next general election so that the people can elect new trustworthy representatives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The expenses scandal has led to a total & irreversible loss of confidence in our members of parliament.  We need to be able to have confidence that our elected representatives are trustworthy & the only way to achieve this will be to have a general election.  Until this happens the parliament is unable to correctly function.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
